name: Penne Pasta in a Tomato Cream Sauce
ingredients: 3 cans of Del Monte Stewed tomatoes with garlic & onion.
steps: Cook pasta according to package directions: drain and keep warm. Cook tomatoes over medium-­‐high heat
in pan until thickened, about 5 min.(I smash the tomatoes with a potato masher). Reduce heat; add basil
and cream. Heat through. DO NOT BOIL. Toss with pasta and cheese and serve.
